title: Perma Banned
body: So I just played a game of ranked with 2 afks and a feeder. I did in fact rage but at no particular player. I quote "fuck this %%%%%% tank meta" and was permanently banned for saying so. I don't understand why it's okay to ban my account worth over $500 for saying words. And feeders cheaters and all around quitters are scott free with leaver buster warning up the wazoo. If you feel I need a time out, then so be it suspend my account, but taking my money for saying cuss words on a game that is meant for a "_mature_" audience is just ridiculous. I have never cheated or went afk in any game out of the over 8k games I have played. Honestly riot I respect your decisions on most things but banning me permanently for a problem easily fixable by muting me or turning profanity filter on is just savage.

That's a very general statement.

Each Rioter has their own expertise, and will likely chime in on things they are knowledgable of, when they see them. A lot of things happen on the forums while we are busy working and don't see everything. 

I for instance am an engineer that has expertise and interest in Player Behavior. So I when I happen to stumble upon a thread where someone is confused about why they were punished I will chime in from time to time. However, the vast majority of my time is spent actually making awesome features.

Right now I'm sitting on my couch, watching LCS, and cruising the forums.

I realize now after searching around about permanent bans that even though I was banned after a game where I didn't ridicule a single player, but instead the meta, I was banned for all the times I DID ridicule players and caused a negative experience. I understand I will probably never get this account back but at least I can still be apart of the community. Sorry for all the false banter!

Several things:

* Give us chatlogs
* This is rated T, which doesn't exactly mean mature audience
* If Riot's rule is to not swear or be rude, shouldn't you be "**mature**" enough to follow that rule?

> WHY IS VERBAL ABUSE PUNISHABLE IF THERE IS A MUTE BUTTON/LANGUAGE FILTER?
Players shouldn't need to rely on features like the mute button or language filter to engage with other players in positive ways. When a player verbally abuses another player and forces him to use the mute button, they have already created a negative experience for that player.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203066050-Tribunal-FAQ#h1q2

Just because you didn't direct it at a particular player doesn't mean it is acceptable. If you were permabanned, most likely you've had a lot of reports and multiple prior punishments as well and was already on the edge of this happening.

I was being targeted by 2 duos is the second game. But none the less ban well deserved and it's all in the past. Starting a new account where I can be less toxic and more positive!

I'm glad you at least realize that the ban was deserved.  That's the first step.  I know how frustrating this game can be sometimes but there is absolutely no point to typing it in chat.  Scream at your monitor if you need to just don't type it in chat.  If your team actually is bad then swearing at them isn't going to do any good because they are trying as hard as they can.  Conversely, if your team is trolling you then swearing at them shows that they are getting to you which is exactly what they want.
